body_html: @anikalindtner Your view as an organizeress differes from that of a normal user. Do you have access to a locally running app where your user account is not an admin? If not, I can setup the staging-area tonight so that we may access it as normal applicants w/o admin superpowerz

body: @anikalindtner Your view as an organizeress differes from that of a normal user. Do you have access to a locally running app where your user account is not an admin? If not, I can setup the staging-area tonight so that we may access it as normal applicants w/o admin superpowerz
